ObjectAttribute.text: The realme C20 is a mobile phone that will keep you entertained and productive at the same time. Its 16.5 cm (6.5) Large HD+ Display ensures that you get an expansive view of movies, games, and even work-related docs for a more immersive experience.
ObjectAttribute.title: Description

ObjectAttribute.text: 8MP AI Rear Camera (f/2.0 Aperture, 4P Lens, 1/4 Inch Sensor Size, 1.12μm Pixel Size, AF), CMOS Sensor, Supports 20 Continuous Shooting, Photograph Functions: Night Mode,
ObjectAttribute.title: Primary Camera

ObjectAttribute.text: 5MP Front Camera (f/2.2 Aperture, 3P Lens, 1/5 Inch Sensor Size, 1.12μm Pixel Size, FF), Photography Functions: Portrait Mode, Timelapse, Panoramic View, Beauty Mode, HDR,
ObjectAttribute.title: Secondary Camera
